SELECT LSEQ , RESERVENO , CONF_ID , TO_CHAR(RESERVE_DATE, 'HH24') "TIME", CNAME , CAPACITY, AVAILABILITY , HO , APPLICANT , PHONE , RESERVE_DATE , MEETINGTITLE FROM CONFERENCE c JOIN CHECKLIST l USING (CONF_ID) JOIN RESERVATION r USING (RESERVENO) WHERE AVAILABILITY = 'Y' AND TRUNC(RESERVE_DATE) = TO_DATE(#{click_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY CNAME ASC

WITH TimeSlots AS ( SELECT LPAD(LEVEL + 8, 2, '00') AS TimeSlot FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 10 ), AllConference AS ( SELECT DISTINCT CONF_ID FROM CHECKLIST ) SELECT COALESCE(r.CONF_ID, ac.CONF_ID) AS CONF_ID, t.TimeSlot, CASE WHEN r.TT IS NULL THEN '예약가능' WHEN t.TimeSlot = r.TT OR TO_CHAR(LPAD(TO_NUMBER(t.TimeSlot) - 1, 2, '00')) = r.TT THEN '사용중' ELSE '점검중' END AS STATUS, c.CNAME, c.CAPACITY, c.AVAILABILITY, c.HO, c.ROOMINFO FROM TimeSlots t CROSS JOIN AllConference ac LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TO_CHAR(RESERVE_DATE, 'HH24') AS TT, CONF_ID FROM CHECKLIST l JOIN RESERVATION r USING(RESERVENO) WHERE TRUNC(RESERVE_DATE) = TO_DATE(#{reserve_day}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) r ON ac.CONF_ID = r.CONF_ID AND (t.TimeSlot = r.TT OR TO_CHAR(LPAD(TO_NUMBER(t.TimeSlot) - 1, 2, '00')) = r.TT) LEFT JOIN CONFERENCE c ON ac.CONF_ID = c.CONF_ID WHERE t.TimeSlot = #{timeslot} AND SUBSTR(c.HO, 1, 1) = #{floor} AND c.CAPACITY > #{capacity} ORDER BY CONF_ID ASC, t.TimeSlot ASC
